Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port for the sift API and web UI.

Config.Name: AppData
Config.Description: Persistent storage for sift.duckdb and sift.config. All inventory data lives here.

Config.Name: DB Path
Config.Description: Path to the DuckDB database file inside the container. Change only if you want to store the DB somewhere other than the AppData volume.

Config.Name: Config Path
Config.Description: Path to the TOML config file inside the container. Place a sift.config file in your AppData folder to customize settings.
